content: Investments Savings Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Oct 2018Anyone knows when next SSB tranche will be released?Am planning to put 5k in the next tranche but to be withdrawn in 2020. Advice if I should put in SSB or just continue in CIMB?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Tong Mian MianLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 30 Oct 20181 Nov, 6pm. The rates should be out in the link below tomorrow.http://www.sgs.gov.sg/savingsbonds/Your-SSB/This-months-bond.aspxwhat's the interest rate you're getting at CIMB now? compare it with the "Average return per year" on the second year, since you are withdrawing in 2020. if it is higher than the interest rate at CIMB, i would say go ahead..Do take into account the $2 fee for each ssb transaction though (buying/selling)0 comments1
